mapper.sql: user_company_id AS userCompanyId, user_id AS userId, company_id AS companyId, status, create_time AS createTime, modify_time AS modifyTime
mapper.select:
select c.company_name from user_company uc inner join company c on c.company_id=uc.company_id inner join t_user u on uc.user_id=u.user_id
and uc.user_id=#{userId}
and uc.status=1
order by c.company_name asc
